name: Connecting lights
description:
Your winter party is about to start, but the storm knocked the batteries out of the controller! Go through the garden to find the batteries and turn the lights on again so your house is party  ready! 

Instructions: Use the arrow or WASD keys to move around. Once you collect all 5 batteries you can press the SPACE button to turn on the lights. 

Credits: All assets and gameplay have been created and designed by me. 

Really enjoyed what I learned in this jam about building assets, would love to add more UI and gameplay in the future! 

Note: the shader that's supposed to move the snow as you walk through it doesn't appear to be working, and the light is a lot darker than it's supposed to be :( any ideas on what might cause this please do let me know! 

if it doesn't play on itch you can find the game here: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/webgl-builds-282809
